body.name: EAST OAK 50,000 BTU Patio Heater with Sand Box, Table Design, Double-Layer Stainless Steel Burner, Wheels, Triple Protection System, Outdoor Heater for Home and Residential, 2023 Upgrade, Bronze
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 12. Order within 5 hrs 2 mins
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 20 hrs 2 mins
features: 𝟱𝟬,𝟬𝟬𝟬 𝗕𝗧𝗨 𝗠𝗼𝗿𝗲 𝗣𝗼𝘄𝗲𝗿𝗳𝘂𝗹 𝗛𝗲𝗮𝘁: EAST OAK outdoor heater have a heat output of up to 50,000 BTUs, which spreads heat from a central heating location up to 20 feet in diameter. With CSA & ETL certification, it's perfect for outdoor and commercial use and can be placed on outdoor balconies, gardens, shopping malls and more.

𝗗𝗼𝘂𝗯𝗹𝗲-𝗟𝗮𝘆𝗲𝗿 𝟯𝟬𝟰 𝗦𝘁𝗮𝗶𝗻𝗹𝗲𝘀𝘀 𝗦𝘁𝗲𝗲𝗹 𝗕𝘂𝗿𝗻𝗲𝗿 𝗠𝗲𝘀𝗵: High quality 304 stainless steel burning grid is used in the design of the double cover heating grid. Compared with traditional single-layer burner mesh heaters, the East Oak Patio Heaters for outdoor use are stronger, more durable, and safer, and the upgraded model's service life can be increased by 30%.

𝗦𝘁𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲 𝗖𝗼𝗻𝗶𝗰𝗮𝗹 𝗕𝗮𝗿𝗿𝗲𝗹 𝗗𝗲𝘀𝗶𝗴𝗻: Compared with the traditional version of the round barrel design, the upgraded conical barrel is more stable, and comes standard with a weight-adjustable water tank (tested up to 26.45 lbs.), which substantially improves the product's wind-resistant performance.

𝗥𝗼𝘂𝗻𝗱 𝗧𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲 𝗣𝗮𝘁𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗗𝗲𝘀𝗶𝗴𝗻: Designed with a round table propane tank lid made of stainless steel material, the outdoor heater for patio is convenient for you to place snacks, drinks, phones or other small things.

𝗘𝗮𝘀𝘆 𝗧𝗼 𝗢𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗲: The outdoor propane heater is easy to start with a one-touch ignition system that lights the flame in less than five seconds. The adjustable control knob helps you control the heat output. The unique round hole design on the bucket allows you to close the gas valve without lifting the bucket.

𝗦𝗮𝗳𝗲𝘁𝘆 𝗣𝗿𝗼𝘁𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗦𝘆𝘀𝘁𝗲𝗺: The tilt protection system will extinguish the flame if the propane patio heater is tilted more than 45 degrees. If the flame goes out, the flame-out protection system shuts off the gas supply.

𝗘𝗮𝘀𝘆 𝗧𝗼 𝗜𝗻𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗹𝗹 𝗔𝗻𝗱 𝗠𝗼𝘃𝗲: The upgraded outdoor patio heater utilizes anti-loosening screws and the reflector cover only requires the assembly of three reflector covers. Installation can be completed in approximately 30 minutes by following the instructions. High-quality wheels on the bottom allow for smooth movement.
body.description: Product Description Note-The patio heater is for outdoor use only.-On rainy days, it is not recommended to use it. When storing, it is recommended to use a protective cover.-We recommend buying a brand new product for a better product experience.-Any items stored above, next to, or under this heater may be subject to radiant heat and in result may be damaged. Combustible materials should be not be within 48 inches of the product.Specifications-ETL & CSA Certified-Gas Type - Propane Only-Propane Type - 20lbs-BTU MAX - 50,000 KW/H-Color - Bronze-Model - UR50BN2MaterialReflector - AluminumBurner - 304 Stainless SteelPost, Tank, Base - iron with zinc printingSize and WeightItem Size - 32x18x87 inchPackage - 20.87x19.3x29.14 inchN.W - 38.3 lbs G.W - 48.72 lbsReflector - 32inch Manufacturer Contact Information 1-833-EAST-OAK (USA) 1-833-327-8625 Mon-Fri: 9:00 am - 5:00 pm PST/PDT

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Priced right, easy to assemble, fired up on first attempt, provides excellent heat output and has continued to work flawlessly for several months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very well made US product, easy instructions.
reviews.reviewText: This was a very well made and sturdy US product. You could tell it wasn't "Made in China" because the instructions were amazing, easy to assemble and had spare parts. A joy to put together and years of enjoyment for a patio heater with family and friends. We will definitely buy more from East Oak°

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Allowed us to take part of our party out to the deck. Very nice and toasty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well, assembly instructions need updating
reviews.reviewText: Bought 2 of these and are enjoying them on our patio. They are easy to move, start and operate and give off a good amount of heat.The assembly was a bit tricky, they have some good ideas for their assembly but poor implementation of those ideas. Good Idea: Segregate parts into groups of parts that are associated with an assembly step (e.g. a set of parts would be labeled 'Step 3'); Poor implementation: Step numbers on packaging often did not match up with the step number in the instructions. Also, there were a couple of times they noted that the hardware would be found already in the part and they were not.Other issue was lack of parts fitting together snuggly in the alignment needed for unit to stand straight. You assemble different sections of the tower and you have to manually, as you tighten several bolts, make sure that the pieces are indeed plum to each other. Our first unit unfortunately stands at a slight angle instead of straight up. Not sure if others notice, but I sure do. May eventually try to reassemble.With the learning from the first unit the second unit went together quite quickly and stands straight up.Overall happy with the units after 1 month of use. It could have earned 5 stars except for the above 2 issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best instructions I have ever !
reviews.reviewText: This was well packaged. Easy to follow clear instructions. Everything marked well. Quality product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Customer Service
reviews.reviewText: My father bought this for my husband and I for Christmas. It is soo cold that I asked for it early. So 2 months after the purchase, I got the heater. I was assembling it but the pole seemed unstable once i put the heavy heating element on top. It was tipping to one side and you could move it easily. I reached out to the customer service email that comes on the nice booklet that came with the heater. I explained my situation, that this was a gift and the purchase information didn't have my information on it. All they asked for was the amazon receipt. I got that from my dad and they instantly sent out a replacement part for the base of the pole. They followed up to make sure I received the part. Then they followed up to make sure the part fixed my problem!! It was amazing customer service! And they were timely too! Soo friendly!!This heater works great! We use it for outdoor company on our porch. My husband is a smoker and likes to hang out outside and this keeps him warm. I highly recommend this heater. The customer service is a high bonus 100%. Make sure you register for the free warranty!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best design for the price and easy to put together
reviews.reviewText: I looked at a ton of different outdoor heaters and this one is really well-designed and easy to put together. The shipping was fast from Amazon and I had it about as quickly as I had time to drive to the different big box stores. This is the best looking outdoor heater that easily outshines what Home Depot and Lowes have available in-store. I don't know how it would last if left outdoors, so definitely buy the cover too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The heater arrived in perfect condition. It was easy to assemble and gets hot. Great heater for the money.
